name: py-dinosaur

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Dinosaur: differentiable dynamics for global atmospheric modeling.

dependencies.name: py-jax
dependencies.description:
JAX is Autograd and XLA, brought together for high-performance machine
learning research. With its updated version of Autograd, JAX can
automatically differentiate native Python and NumPy functions. It can
differentiate through loops, branches, recursion, and closures, and it
can take derivatives of derivatives of derivatives. It supports reverse-
mode differentiation (a.k.a. backpropagation) via grad as well as
forward-mode differentiation, and the two can be composed arbitrarily to
any order.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-pint
dependencies.description:
Pint is a Python package to define, operate and manipulate physical
quantities: the product of a numerical value and a unit of measurement.
It allows arithmetic operations between them and conversions from and to
different units.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn
dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-xarray
dependencies.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python

dependencies.name: py-xarray-tensorstore
dependencies.description:
Xarray-TensorStore is a small library that allows opening Zarr arrays
into Xarray via TensorStore, instead of the standard Zarr-Python
library.

dependent_to.name: py-neuralgcm
dependent_to.description: NeuralGCM: Hybrid ML + Physics model of Earth's atmosphere.
